org.digidoc4j

Interface ValidationResult


  • public interface ValidationResult
    Validation result information. For Asic the ValidationResult contains only information for the first signature of each signature XML file

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getErrors

        List<DigiDoc4JException> getErrors()
        Return a list of errors. DDOC returns all validation results as errors.
        Returns:
        list of errors

      • getWarnings

        List<DigiDoc4JException> getWarnings()
        Return a list of warnings. DDOC always returns an empty list.
        Returns:
        list of warnings

      • hasErrors

        @Deprecated
boolean hasErrors()
        Deprecated. use isValid() instead.
        Are there any validation errors.
        Returns:
        value indicating if any errors exist

      • hasWarnings

        boolean hasWarnings()
        Are there any validation warnings. DDOC always returns false.
        Returns:
        value indicating if any warnings exist

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        true when document is valid

      • getReport

        Get validation report.
        Returns:

      • getContainerErrors

        List<DigiDoc4JException> getContainerErrors()
        Get list container related errors. DDOC returns a list of errors encountered when validating meta data ASIC returns a list of errors encountered when opening the container
        Returns:
        List of exceptions
